titleStmt.title: Here begynneth the dyfference of astronomye with the gouernayle to kepe mans body in helth, all the foure seasons of the yeare.
Secretum secretorum. Selections. English.
titleStmt.author: Aristotle, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted by me Robert wyer, dwellynge at the sygne of Seynt Ioh[a]n Euangelyst, in Seynt Martyns Parysshe besyde Charynge Crosse,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; suggested publication date from STC.
Identified as STC 6837 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
